message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course. What are your thoughts?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, thanks for your interest and counter-offer. I understand your perspective on the price. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me to accept, I could be flexible. Would you consider $13,500? I believe that represents a fair compromise.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $13,000. Can you consider that?
